rukus.text: He imana vali'o! Sabara (dhiraja) ate namaza de rahim saha'ita prapata karo. Yakinana hi alaha sabara rakhana vali'am de nala hai
Ate jihare loka alaha de raha vica mare jana. Unham nu mritaka na kaho. Uha jivata hana. Paratu tuhanu gi'ana nahim
Ate asim zarura tuhanu imatihana vica pavange, _kujha dara ate bhukha nala ate sapati ate pranam ate falam di kami nala drira rahina vali'am nu khusakhabari de devo
Jisa da hala iha hai ki jadom unham upara ko'i musakala a'undi hai tam uha kahide hana, asim alaha de ham ate use di tarafa paratana vale ham
Ihom hi loka hana jinham upara unham de raba valom visesa kirapa ate rahimata hai. Ate iho loka hana, jo vadhi'a raha te hana

Safa ate marava (make di'a do pahari'am) besaka alaha di'am yadam vicom hana. Jihara vi'akati alaha de ghara da haja kare jam umara kare tam usa nu cahida hai ki unham di parikarama kare ate jihara hai

Jihare loka, sadi'am utari'am ho'i'am khul'hi'am nisani'am ate sade maraga darasana nu luka'unde hana, isa tom ba'ada ki asim lokam nu kitaba vica dasa cuke ham tam iha uhi loka hana jinham nu alaha thukara devega, ate unham upara lahanata pa'una vale lahanata pa'unde hana
Ham jinham ne tauba (khima jacana) da haura sudhara kara li'a ate sapasata rupa nala varanana kara dita tam maim unham nu mu'afa kara devagam ate mai' ham mu'afa karana vala, rahimata vala
Besaka jinham lokam ne jhuthala'i'a ate uha use halata vica mara ga'e tam uhi loka hana ki jinha upara alaha di ate farisati'a di ate manukham di sabha di phatakara hai
Isa halata vica uha hamesa rahinage. Unham uparom azaba ghata nahi kita javega ate na hi unham nu dhila diti javegi
Ate tuhade la'i ibadata de yoga ika (raba) hi hai, usa de binam ko'i badagi yoga nahim. Uha bahuta rahimata vala ate ati'ata kirapasila hai
